name: Subacute Thyroiditis
chief_complaint: I've had a sore throat and neck pain for weeks, and I feel feverish and tired all the time
prognosis: Typically self-limiting with complete recovery in 3-6 months, though may progress through hyperthyroid and hypothyroid phases
description: Inflammatory thyroid condition often following viral illness, characterized by thyroid pain, transient hyperthyroidism, and elevated inflammatory markers. The thyroid gland shows patchy inflammation on histology.
